column6: Captain America's Day One! He's got the strength. He's got the training. But has he got what it takes? A ragtag Special Forces unit takes Captain America on his first mission of World War II. Their orders? Don't get him killed! But when the low-profile assignment draws the attention of Baron Strucker, the future Red Skull and half the Nazi army, it'll be a crash course in super heroics for Marvel's first Avenger!
column8: | penciller:Gurihiru | writer:BRIAN DEAN CLEVINGER | penciller (cover):Barry Kitson
